caseTitle: The Bank of Punjab v. Haris Steel Industries, etc.
tagline: The assumption of the office of Acting Chairman NAB by Deputy Chairman is illegal and it is, therefore, directed that a regular appointment to the vacant office of Chairman NAB be made in terms of section 6 of the NAB Ordinance, 1999 within thirty days. Also, the appointment of Mr. Irfan Qadir, Advocate Supreme Court, as the Prosecutor-General Accountability is unlawful and of no legal effect.
